p: Incorporating more emphasis on these strategies could result in a silver lining of the COVID-19 tragedy being that we reverse the tide of the American chronic disease epidemic. If there's anything this COVID-19 pandemic has demonstrated, it's that if there is a collective will, action can happen. We must focus some of that collective will, in the form of practice habits, research efforts, and policy recommendations, on a central factor that will lead to a healthier and more prosperous future: foundational metabolic health.
